filesharing.core.client

Class FileDownloader

  • java.lang.Object
    • filesharing.core.client.FileDownloader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrackerResponseProcessor, Runnable

    public class FileDownloader
extends Object
implements Runnable, TrackerResponseProcessor
    File metadata and content downloader - makes requests to peers and handles responses
